name: The Pacific House
description:
Welcome to Pacific House Hostel – Your Multi Award-Winning Backpacker Haven in Sydney!

At Pacific House Hostel, we know that you are looking for more than just a place to sleep. We provide a clean, safe, social and fun atmosphere where you can meet fellow guests, create unforgettable memories, and experience the best of Sydney. That’s why we’ve designed our hostel with you in mind! 
Top-notch amenities for your comfort and convenience: 
•	Rooms professionally cleaned every day and equipped with privacy curtains on all bunk beds, bedside USB ports, reading lights and two large lockers 
        per guest
•	24/7 reception, TV lounge, study, laundry room and kitchen with air fryers, stove tops, microwaves, toasters, sandwich presses and much more!
•	FREE fridge bags, dry food storage and earplugs
•	FREE breakfast every day
•	FREE Wi-Fi throughout the hostel and room key on your phone using the GOKI app!
•	Café, bar and Pizzeria in the hostel with discounts and deals for guests including Happy Hours
•	FREE yoga mats, footballs, basketballs and volleyballs to use

We host a multitude of FREE events to keep you entertained and connected:
•	Trivia Night: Test your knowledge and win awesome prizes with free wine and popcorn
•	Yoga Classes: Relax and rejuvenate with our professional instructors twice a week!
•	Sunday Football: Join in with fellow guests on an outdoor pitch across the road from the hostel (We have goals, bibs, cones and half-time oranges!)
•	Wine & Cheese Night: Celebrate Friday by unwinding with glasses of wine, plates of cheese and crackers and meet new friends
•	Hosted Coogee to Bondi Walk: Enjoy one of Sydney’s best routes hugging the beautiful coastline
•	Movie Night: Unwind and relax with popcorn every Monday night

There are 2 Free Events per day!

Safe, Secure and Welcoming:
Your safety and comfort are our top priorities. We’ve created a clean and secure environment where you can feel at ease and truly at home - and our guests agree! Reception is open 24/7 and CCTV constantly monitors the building
Perfect Location and Stylish Surroundings
Situated in the heart of Sydney, our iconic heritage-listed building offers easy access to the city’s vibrant culture, scenery and nightlife. Relax in our calming, clean and beautifully decorated spaces.
Join us at Pacific House Hostel – where backpackers become lifelong friends.

houseRules.notes:
1. Arrivals and Departures
Check in is from 2pm through 12am Midnight. Should you expect to arrive outside these times please contact us directly to discuss if/how we can check you in. Guests may arrive earlier and leave their luggage at the hostel but access to rooms may not be granted until after 2pm. Departing guests must remove all their belongings from their room, and check out, before 10am. After this time guests may make use of the luggage storage facilities but all possessions must be removed from the room.
*Cancellation Policy- 24 Hours Before Check In Time for Share Rooms. Private Rooms are non refundable and not cancellable. 
2. Check In
An international passport or acceptable photo ID must be presented at check in for all guests. Failure to provide acceptable ID will mean that you cannot check in.
3. Check Out
*Check out is at 10am*
4. Age Restriction
Bookings cannot be accepted from anybody under the age of 18. Unlike some hostels we do not have an upper age limit. Most of our guests are Backpackers in the 18 to 35 age range. Please be aware that you may be assigned a top bunk!
5. Payment 
We are a cashless business. Cash is not accepted at reception or in our onsite laundry. You may pay with MasterCard, Visa or Debit Card at the property. The number of nights pre-booked must be paid for on arrival. Once checked-in, your reservation is non-refundable. All taxes are included within the room rate.
6. Guest Behaviour
The comfort, safety and security of our guests is of paramount importance to The Pacific House Hostel. Any guest(s) who, in the opinion of our staff, compromise the comfort, safety or security of other guests, staff or local residents will be asked to leave the hostel premises and may not be offered a refund. Guests are expected to respect other guests, staff, local residents and property. In the case of groups, the group leaders must ensure that all members of their group behave in an acceptable manor. Failure of any individual group member to do so will result in the expulsion of the whole group.
7. Smoking or Vaping
Smoking or vaping is not permitted anywhere on the premises. Any guest found smoking or vaping within the building will be asked to leave the premises immediately and will not be offered a refund. There are areas available for smoking outside and away from the front door.  
8. Personal Property
Guests may leave their luggage in an area located next to reception however it remains the guest's responsibility to ensure that their personal belongings are secure at all times. Guests are only able to leave their luggage for 24 hours.  The Pacific House Hostel accepts no liability for the loss, theft or damage to property however sustained or caused. Please bring a padlock to use with your locker or purchase one from reception.
9. Hostel Property
Guests will be expected to reimburse The Pacific House Hostel for any damages caused by inappropriate behavior during their stay.
10. Your Information
The Pacific House shall only store and use information you supply to us or which is supplied to us for the purposes of carrying out our contract with you and to inform you of other services and offers which we make available from time to time. 
11. Errors and Omissions
Any omission or error in sales literature, web pages or site, order form, quotation, price list, order acknowledgement, dispatch note, invoice or other document issued by us may be corrected by us without liability. We will advise you of any changes at the time of booking or as soon as is reasonably possible thereafter.
12. Discretion
All bookings are subject to availability and The Pacific House Hostel reserves the right to decline any booking at its discretion.
13. Late departure
In the case of a late departure, The Pacific House reserves the right to charge for a further nights stay at the appropriate rack rate of the bed(s). Management discretion will apply.  
14. Length of Stay
Our hostel caters for international guests and bona fide travellers. From time to time, we may offer weekly rates.  Management discretion will apply.
15. Dorm Rooms
When you book 1 or more dorm beds, we cannot guarantee that your entire group can be in the same dorm room. Please book private room(s) if you wish to secure that everyone in your group is going to be in the same room.
16. Noise
From 11pm there is to be no noise outside the front of the hostel!  Should we receive complaints from our neighbours or Police, we may evict anybody making noise, playing music and hanging out the front of the Hostel.
17. All E-Bike batteries are banned from the Hostel. Please seek alternative accommodation if you have an E-Bike. This is for the safety of everyone.
18. New Years Eve
For New Years Eve in Sydney all bookings are non refundable and full payment will be required on arrival.
**Please note that all bookings have a 3-night minimum stay during the dates of December 30th, 31st, and January 1st and bookings during this period are non-refundable and non-cancellable. So, to be clear there are no check ins or check outs on the 31stof December and 1st of January. If your booking contains a check in or out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation. **

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
